SELECT BUDGET_CODE , TO_CHAR(START_DT, 'dd-mm-yyyy') START_DT , TO_CHAR(END_DT, 'dd-mm-yyyy') END_DT , BUDGET_CODE_TEXT , CRT_USER_ID , CRT_DT , UPD_USER_ID , UPD_DT FROM FCM0010M WHERE 1=1
AND START_DT <= SYSDATE AND END_DT >= SYSDATE
AND BUDGET_CODE LIKE '%'|| #{budgetCode} || '%'
AND LOWER(BUDGET_CODE_TEXT) LIKE LOWER('%'|| #{budgetCodeText} || '%')

SELECT DISTINCT F10.BUDGET_CODE, F10.BUDGET_CODE_TEXT, F9.GL_ACC_CODE, F9.GL_ACC_DESC, TO_CHAR(F10.START_DT, 'DD-MM-YYYY') START_DT, TO_CHAR(F10.END_DT, 'DD-MM-YYYY') END_DT FROM FCM0010M F10 INNER JOIN FCM0101M F01 ON F01.BUDGET_CODE = F10.BUDGET_CODE INNER JOIN FCM0104D F4 ON F4.BUDGET_CODE = F4.BUDGET_CODE AND F4.GL_ACC_CODE = F01.GL_ACC_CODE INNER JOIN FCM0009M F9 ON F9.GL_ACC_CODE = F4.GL_ACC_CODE WHERE F01.BUDGET_PLAN_YEAR = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')
AND F01.COST_CENTR = #{searchCostCenter}
AND F10.BUDGET_CODE = #{searchBudgetCode}
AND F10.BUDGET_CODE LIKE '%'|| #{budgetCode} || '%'
AND LOWER(F10.BUDGET_CODE_TEXT) LIKE LOWER('%'|| #{budgetCodeText} || '%')
AND F9.GL_ACC_CODE LIKE '%'|| #{glAccCode} || '%'
AND LOWER(F9.GL_ACC_DESC) LIKE LOWER('%'|| #{glAccCodeDesc} || '%')

SELECT GL_ACC_CODE , GL_ACC_DESC , GL_ACC_CRT_DT , CRT_USER_ID , CRT_DT , UPD_USER_ID , UPD_DT FROM FCM0009M WHERE 1=1
AND GL_ACC_CODE LIKE '%'|| #{glAccCode} || '%'
AND LOWER(GL_ACC_DESC) LIKE LOWER('%'|| #{glAccCodeDesc} || '%')

SELECT F1.CLM_TYPE, F1.EXP_TYPE, F1.EXP_TYPE_NAME, F1.DISAB_FLAG FROM FCM0001M F1 LEFT JOIN FCM0010M F01 ON F01.BUDGET_CODE = F1.BUDGET_CODE WHERE 1=1
AND F01.START_DT <= SYSDATE AND F01.END_DT >= SYSDATE
AND F1.EXP_TYPE LIKE '%'|| #{expenseCode} ||'%'
AND F1.EXP_TYPE_NAME LIKE '%'|| #{expenseCodeText} ||'%'
